sentences.en: All these data seem to have been accurately measured by Babylonian astronomers as early as 1800 BC.
sentences.cn: 所有这些数据好像由巴比伦的天文学家在公元前1800年就精确地计算出来了.

sentences.en: At the ending of this article, some basic knowledge about the Old Babylonian Period is added.
sentences.cn: 文末附有有关古巴比伦时期基础知识的附录,并摘有原始楔形文字泥板文献数篇.

sentences.en: But in 597 and 586 B.C., the Babylonian Empire conquered the Israelites, and the Ark, at the time supposedly stored in the Temple in Jerusalem, vanished from history.
sentences.cn: 但巴比伦王国分别在公元前597年和586年征服了以色列人。 据推测约柜当时就藏于耶路撒冷的圣殿之中，之后就从历史中烟消云散了。

sentences.en: But the Babylonian army pursued them and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho.
sentences.cn: 迦勒底的军队追赶他们,在耶利哥的平原追上西底家,将他拿住,带到哈马地的利比拉,巴比伦王尼布甲尼撒那里.

sentences.en: By 2000 B . C , Babylonian arithmetic had evolved into a well - developed rhetorical, or prose, algebra.
sentences.cn: 大约在公元前2000年, 巴比伦算术已经演化成为一种高度发展的用文字叙述的代数学.

sentences.en: Hence, the Babylonian method is numerically stable, while Method X is numerically unstable.
sentences.cn: 因此, 巴比伦的方法是数值稳定的, 而方法X是数值不稳定.

sentences.en: In the years around 2000 BC, the Babylonian New Year began with the first New Moon (actually the first visible crescent) after the Vernal Equinox (first day of spring).
sentences.cn: 大约在公元前2000年，巴比伦的新年随着春分（春天的第一天）之后的第一个新月（实际上第一个看得见的新月）开始了。

sentences.en: It allowed Hebrew society and Judaism to strengthen for another crucial century—by which time the Babylonian king Nebuchadrezzar could banish the Hebrew people but not obliterate them or their faith.
sentences.cn: 它使得希伯莱社会和犹太教在关键的一个世纪内不断强大。 在这重要的时间内，巴比伦王尼布甲尼最多撒流放希伯莱人，而无法消灭他们，抑或扼杀他们的信仰。

sentences.en: Lastly, author points out Babylonian mathematics influence on the development of science.
sentences.cn: 最后, 作者指出了巴比伦数学对科学发展的影响.

sentences.en: Later Babylonian maps show streams, valleys, and the layout of towns.
sentences.cn: 晚期的巴比伦地图标示了河流 、 山谷以及城镇的分布.

sentences.en: Million of readers have been helped by the famous " Babylonian Parables ".
sentences.cn: 数百万读者已经从这本著名的 “ 巴比伦寓言 ” 中得到了帮助.

sentences.en: So too the stories of Moses and of Samson have Sumerian and Babylonian parallels.
sentences.cn: 同样,关于摩西和参孙的传说在苏美尔和巴比伦也有相似的版本.

sentences.en: The early Babylonian's most popular resolution was to return borrowed farm equipment.
sentences.cn: 早期巴比伦人最普遍的计划是归还借来的耕种工具。

sentences.en: The principles of astrology used today are almost the as those used by the Babylonian astrologers.
sentences.cn: 近日使用的占星术原理与巴比伦占星师当年所用的几乎完全相同.
